text: We also receive a limited amount of data on our customers' customers.

We only use strictly necessary cookies.
We use cookies to help us provide you with a personalized service, and to help make our website and service better for you.
As far as these cases are concerned, Transloadit receives the following data on end-users:
Transloadit collects and shares information about its customers.
In order to provide this service, we capture and store information about you and about users uploading material to the service:
Transloadit only stores links to uploaded media files in the status JSON of an Assembly .

We will retain your personal information for the duration of our business relationship and afterwards for as long as is necessary and relevant for our legitimate business purposes, or as otherwise permitted by applicable laws and regulations.

Storing media files

Transloadit only stores temporary files, and we do so for 24 hours .
